title: How would Steve Jobs react to the use of the iPhone we have today? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, he will smash new iphone on desk and crack it because he will find nothing beautiful inside iphone software, steve jobs known as perfectionist, if you pay attention to notification swipe action there is three option which is really not perfect they put small title in big buttons really? is that beautiful he will say it no!!!! also if you swipe on left from home screen you will find list of recent apps and shortcuts why this thing needed if no one find really important to use? there is so many things steve jobs find annoying in ios 13 but last action of steve jobs is reject ios 13 and rebuild from scratch.
